title: Deactivate Departing Employee's Access
description: An employee has resigned. The security admin must deactivate all their access on their last day.

tasks.description: Receive the offboarding notification from HR for the departing employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin receives the official request to terminate access for a specific employee.

tasks.description: Deactivate the employee's user account in all port systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user's login credentials for the TOS, finance system, and email are disabled.

tasks.description: Deactivate the employee's physical port access ID card.
tasks.expected_outcome: The employee's ID card is disabled in the access control system, preventing physical entry.
